oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Noontime Neighbors - 1950-11-04 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM's Noontime Neighbors, originally broadcast 1950-11-04, part 1. Hosted by John McDonald and Andy Wilson, with Annie Lou and Danny Dill, Mac McGar, Owen Bradley and the Noontime Neighbor Band, with guest A. E. Puckett. Part 2: http://cmfdigitization.cmf.int:2011/cdm/ref/collection/musicaudio/id/463
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Andy Wilson; Annie Lou & Danny; Owen Bradley; Noontime Neighbor Band
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening theme (Andy Wilson vocals) -- Opening statement (John McDonald) -- Andy Wilson introduces the guests -- Dime A Dozen (Annie Lou & Danny) -- John McDonald talks about the 4-H Club -- John McDonald reports on farm news -- Casey Jones (Owen Bradley and the Noontime Neighbor Band) -- John McDonald talks about the production of the movie Land Of Life -- John McDonald reports on farm news -- Tennessee Border (Owen Bradley and the Noontime Neighbor Band, Andy Wilson vocals) -- Weather report (Andy Wilson)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Noontime neighbors (Radio program); Bradley, Owen; Noontime Neighbor Band; Dill, Danny; Dill, Annie Lou Stockard; Annie Lou and Danny; Land of life (Motion picture)
